stories.Title: What the future holds for OpenAI
stories.Description: In a recent conversation with a group of developers, Sam Altman shed light on OpenAI's roadmap, emphasizing the importance of responsible regulation alongside the preservation of open source ideals.

stories.Title: The MIT team is keeping things “SimPLE”
stories.Description: Researchers at MIT's CSAIL team have unveiled a scalable model that outshines larger counterparts, with self-learning capabilities that eliminate the need for annotated data.

stories.Title: Hurry up if you want your domain!
stories.Description: A report by Axios reveals a significant increase of 156% in .ai domain registrations, overshadowing the growth of .com registrations. Are you planning to launch an AI innovation? Secure your spot now.

stories.Title: Designer lands into Teams
stories.Description: The AI-powered art-generating tool is now available for free, allowing users to effortlessly produce stunning visuals for presentations and digital content.

stories.Title: What's all the buzz about AI chips?
stories.Description: These intriguing pieces of silicon are propelling an AI revolution that promises to reshape industries and economies. Still skeptical? Just ask Nvidia.

stories.Title: Unleash the power of Falcon 40B
stories.Description: The Technology Innovation Institute is now allowing unrestricted access to UAE's top open-source AI model, currently ranking first on Hugging Face's leaderboard.

stories.Title: An electrifying road is ahead
stories.Description: Join Jeep on an exciting journey into the world of EVs and autonomous driving. Watch the Grand Cherokee 4xe as it puts AI and autonomous off-road technology to the test in Moab, Utah.

stories.Title: Is the year of mixed-reality
stories.Description: Oppo recently announced the Oppo MR Glass Developer Edition, a state-of-the-art headset that offers developers an immersive platform to unleash their creativity.

stories.Title: Just days ahead of the WWDC…
stories.Description: Meta steals the spotlight from Apple in the mixed-reality arena with the announcement of Quest 3. Offering "high-res color mixed reality", a thinner design, and enhanced graphics.

stories.Title: Gear up for your new Mac
stories.Description: As WWDC approaches, anticipation grows for the launch of new Mac desktop computers featuring the latest M2 Max processor and the M2 Ultra chip.

stories.Title: Live from Computex 2023
stories.Description: Taipei is the place to be if you want to know all the latest and greatest in laptops and PCs. Take a look at all the highlights from Computex, and buckle up for the future of computing.

title: Meta steals Apple's spotlight, Get to know OpenAI's plans, Anticipation grows for new Macs
